name: @peoplepower/webcore
description: Client JS/TS SDK for Care Daily Cloud API

scripts.build: bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm && bun run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/webcore.ts --format cjs --sourcemap=linked --external axios --external qs --target node --outdir dist --entry-naming webcore.cjs.js
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/webcore.ts --format esm --sourcemap=linked --external axios --external qs --target node --outdir dist --entry-naming webcore.esm.js
